name: Reaper
storyline:
FEAR THE REAPER

REAPER is a medieval-themed first-person shooter, drawing inspiration from such classic titles as Doom, Quake and Hitman.

Play as Death Incarnate, and follow the guidance of a mysterious spirit, tasking you with collecting the souls of a series of targets, and condemning them to the Hell below.

Features:
Single Player Campaign Taking Place Across 12 Levels.
Trials Mode - A One-Hit-Kill Challenge Over 25 Small Arenas.
Full Voice Acting - With Many Cameos.
Boss Fights
Dark Humour
Stunning Pixel Art
Original Soundtrack
5 Weapons
8 Enemy Types
12 Bosses

Expect to die, a lot, but YOU ARE DEATH and DEATH NEVER DIES.

Learning enemy placement is pivotal to success.

Teach them to fear the REAPER.
